snippet: John D. Podesta, a veteran infighter who has galvanized the struggling Clinton and Obama White Houses, is preparing to bring his strong hand to Hillary Rodham Clinton’s 2016 presidential campaign.
abstract: John D Podesta, who has left position as top aide to Pres Obama, is expected to assume role of chairman of Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign, where he will deliver much-needed aggression and structure to her 2016 bid; Podesta has reputation for competitive toughness and strong record of pushing Democratic agendas.
lead_paragraph: John D. Podesta, a veteran infighter who has galvanized the struggling Clinton and Obama White Houses, is preparing to bring his strong hand to Hillary Rodham Clinton’s 2016 presidential campaign.

headline.main: For Hillary Clinton, John Podesta Is a Right Hand With a Punch
headline.print_headline: For 2nd Clinton, a Right Hand With a Punch
